EmailTemplate.description: Send notification to customer whenever case comment is created.
EmailTemplate.name: Case Comment Notification to Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Comment to Ecolab Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
This message is to inform you that a new comment has been made on your case {!Case.CaseNumber} regarding {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.Last_Case_Comment}.
To reply to the comment, please click the following link:
{!$Label.Ecolab_Community_URL}{!Case.Id}
If you are unable to click the above link, please copy and paste it into your browser's address bar.
Thank you for being an Ecolab customer.
Best,
Ecolab Support Team
-----
Please do not reply to this email. This is a system generated email to inform you of updates to your Ecolab Case. This message was generated from https://connect.ecolab.com.
